titles.title: Weatherization Enhancement and Local Energy Efficiency Investment and Accountability Act of 2019
Weatherization Enhancement and Local Energy Efficiency Investment and Accountability Act of 2019
Weatherization Enhancement and Local Energy Efficiency Investment and Accountability Act of 2019
Weatherization Enhancement and Local Energy Efficiency Investment and Accountability Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Energy Conservation and Production Act to reauthorize the weatherization assistance program, and for other purposes.
Weatherization Enhancement and Local Energy Efficiency Investment and Accountability Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Energy. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 116-82.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 185.

term.name: Energy assistance for the poor and aged
